content: Hey @project-const-generics -- could somebody prepare a status update and post it as a comment on https://github.com/rust-lang/lang-team/issues/51? We are having our monthly update meeting next Wednesday, so sometime before then would be great!

Hey all!

The lang team is holding the next planning meeting on July 7th (next week), and is looking for updates from the active projects. Please leave them on your issue on the lang-team repo: https://github.com/rust-lang/lang-team/issues/51

Good questions to consider:

  • What are recent topics of discussion?
  • Any exciting developments since the last check-in?
  • Any points where the group is stuck and the lang-team could weigh in?
  • Any potential design meeting topics?
  • Any other concerns?

No worries if there's not been any significant progress since the last update.
cc @project-const-generics looks like there's not been an update posted just yet, could someone try and do so?
@nikomatsakis did you say you were going to do this? if you cant i can try write soemthing up ^^
@Boxy [she/her] that would be helpful
I think we need a design meeting about the meaning of equality
and I had planned to work more on that hackmd
